content: Dr. K. Guruvidyathri from School of Engineering Sciences and Technology, University of Hyderabad has delivered invited lectures online on 'Computational thermodynamics and kinetics' as a part of the course 'Integrated Computational Materials Engineering' for the students of 'M.Eng. in Sustainable Advanced Materials' at University of Johannesburg, South Africa. The course is taught mostly by experts across the world in various domains.
